sentence.Network_en: Einstein formulated the Theory of Relativity in 1905.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱因斯坦于1905年创立了相对论。

sentence.Network_en: According to the theory of relativity, nothing can travel faster than light.
sentence.Network_cn: 根据相对论，任何东西都无法超越光速。

sentence.Network_en: Einstein's theory of relativity won for him universal esteem.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱因斯坦的相对论赢得了全世界对他的崇敬.

是关联(Relativity)、反应(Reaction)、关系(Relation)和回报(Retribution)，最后一个是retribution 不是reward~~~~~这是艾略特·艾登伯.

encyclopedia.content: realativity简介realativity是相对论的意思，主要由爱因斯坦(Albert Einstein)创立，分为狭义相对论锛執厥庀喽月埏級和广义相对论锛堃话阆喽月埏級。相对论的基本假设是光速不变原理，相对性原理和等效原理。相对论和量子力学是现代物理学的两大基本支柱。奠定了经典物理学基础的经典力学，不适用于高速运动的物体和微观条件下的物体。相对论解决了高速运动问题；量子力学解决了微观亚原子条件下的问题。相对论极大的改变了人类对

entry.def: The theory of relativity is Einstein's theory concerning space, time, and motion.

means.word_mean: 1. (physics) the theory that space and time are relative concepts rather than absolute concepts

auth_sentence.content: Well, there has been a break with relativity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Well, there has been a break with relativity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Well, there has been a break with relativity.

auth_sentence.content: Thus special relativity is predicting nonsense in this respect.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thus special relativity is predicting nonsense in this respect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thus special relativity is predicting nonsense in this respect.

auth_sentence.content: You don't seem to be familiar with relativity.
auth_sentence.res_content: You don't seem to be familiar with relativity.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,由-ive+-ity组成,"由……能力或特性"

stems_affixes.word_buile: conduct传导+ivity由……能力或特性→n.传导性,传导率
create创造+ivity由……能力或特性→n.创造力;独创性

stems_affixes.value_cn: 相对性,相关性,[物]相对论
stems_affixes.word_buile: relate使联系,发生关系+ivity由……能力或特性→n.相对性,相关性,[物]相对论
resist抵抗,反抗,抗,忍得住+ivity由……能力或特性→n.抵抗力,电阻系数
select选择+ivity由……能力或特性→n.选择性

Sentence.sentence: Albert Einstein predicted this in 1905, when he introduced the concept of relative time as part of his Special Theory of Relativity.
Thus, time and time's relativity are measurable by any hourglass, alarm clock, or an atomic clock that can measure a billionth of a second.

sentences.cn: 他们终于接受了爱因斯坦的相对论。

sentences.en: There is no relativity between the two matters.

jushi.english: There is no relativity between the two matters.

jushi.chinese: 他们终于接受了爱因斯坦的相对论。
